name: A Christmas Village
description:
In this city-building puzzle game, you need to switch different types of buildings on a grid to form the village into one with a lot of harmony. 

Balance out and switch positions of 6 different building types and 13 levels.

Different types of buildings harmonize differently with each other:

Forest + Factory = -10

Village + Village = +5

Music made by Mike Heijblom
